4.1.1.1.11. src.IOT_OCTvolume module¶

-- coding: utf-8 --

File: IOT_OCTvolume.py

Class IOT_OCTvolume

A set of OCT scans. All scans are of :class:`IOT_OCTscan`s.

Log:
Date Author Description
26-Aug-2018 FOE
  • Class created.
2-Dec-2018 FOE
  • Minor debugging.
13-Dec-2018 FOE
  • Remove importing of deprecated.
19-Feb-2018 FOE
  • Bug fixed. Importing of IOT_OCTscan.

Parameters:theScan (IOT_OCTscan) – The OCT scan.

clear()[source]¶

Clears the OCT volume; Removes all scans.

Returns:None
getScans(type)[source]¶

Retrieves all scans in the volume of type t.

Parameters:t (char) – Scan type ‘A’, ‘B’ or ‘C’
Returns:The set of A scans in the volume
Return type:list

See also

IOT_OCTvolume.getVolume()

getVolume(type)[source]¶

Retrieves the (sub-)volume of scans of type t.

Parameters:t (char) – Scan type ‘A’, ‘B’ or ‘C’
Returns:A volume with the set of scans of type t.
Return type:IOT_OCTvolume

See also

IOT_OCTvolume.getScans()

scans¶

The set of OCT scans.

Getter:Gets the set of scans
Setter:Sets the set of scans
Type:list. All scans are of IOT_OCTscan
